title.native: ロクでなし魔術講師と禁忌教典(アカシックレコード)
title.romaji: Rokudenashi Majutsu Koushi to Akashic Records
title.english: Akashic Records of Bastard Magic Instructor

description:
In the "action fantasy" story, Glenn is a part-time teacher at a magic school who is inclined to write "self-study" on the blackboard and then take a nap. One of his students, Sistine, gets angry and challenges him to a duel and he is easily defeated. However, when a terrible incident threatens the school, Glenn shows intense dedication to protecting his students.

(Source: Anime News Network)
synonyms: อาจารย์เวทมนตร์ไม่เอาไหนกับตำนานปราสาทลอยฟ้า

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Teacher
tags.description: Protagonist is an educator, usually in a school setting.

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: Tsundere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who acts cold and hostile in order to mask warmer emotions.

tags.name: Anti-Hero
tags.description: Features a protagonist who lacks conventional heroic attributes and may be considered a borderline villain.

tags.name: Kuudere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who generally retains a cold, blunt and cynical exterior, but once one gets to know them, they have a very warm and loving interior.

tags.name: Gore
tags.description: Prominently features graphic bloodshed and violence.

tags.name: Female Harem
tags.description: Main cast features the protagonist plus several female characters who are romantically interested in them.

node.description:
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/taro_hituji)

Tarou Hitsuji is a Japanese novelist. Tarou won the 26th Fantasia Bunko Award with his debut work Rokudenashi Majutsu Koushi to Kinki Kyouten (ロクでなし魔術講師と禁忌教典) in 2014 and has been writing for Fantasia Bunko since then.

__Machida Touko__ is a Japanese script/screenwriter and series composer.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/sakuribo)

[Website](http://konomi-suzuki.net/) | [Old Blog](http://ameblo.jp/galapa-konomi) | [New Blog](http://ameblo.jp/konomi-suzuki/)

Konomi Suzuki is a Japanese singer from Osaka Prefecture who is signed to Amuleto. After winning the Animax All-Japan Anisong Grand Prix in 2011, she made her debut in 2012 with the release of her first single "Choir Jail", which peaked at 34 on the Oricon charts; the title track of which was used as the opening theme to the anime television series Dusk Maiden of Amnesia. She released her first album 17, in 2014, two albums in 2015, and a further album Lead, in 2016.

Suzuki cites the character Sheryl Nome from Macross Frontier as her inspiration for making music for anime. Her music has been featured in anime series such as The Pet Girl of Sakurasou, No Matter How I Look at It, It's You Guys' Fault I'm Not Popular!, No Game No Life, and Re:Zero − Starting Life in Another World. She has also performed in events in Japan such as Animelo Summer Live and Animax Musix, and at international events in China, Germany, the United States, and Southeast Asia. In 2018, Suzuki made her voice acting debut, playing the role of Rin in the anime television series Lost Song.

[Profile](http://www.kenproduction.co.jp/talent/member.php?mem=w88)

__Non-anime roles:__
Bataan in "Azur Lane"
Bush in "Aur Lane" (VG)
Hazelwood in "Azur Lane" (VG)
Kiyoka Musumi in "Toji no Miko" (VG) (Japanese)
Shangri-la in "Azur Lane" (VG)
Sucrose in "Genshin Impact"

__Height:__ 152 cm (5' 0")
__Agency:__ I'm Enterprise

[Profile (I'm Enterprise)](https://www.imenterprise.jp/profile.php?id=31) | [Official Blog](https://ameblo.jp/ari-step/) | [Wiki (en)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ari_Ozawa) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E5%B0%8F%E6%BE%A4%E4%BA%9C%E6%9D%8E)

On August 10th, 2020, she announced her marriage to musician [Hige Driver](https://anilist.co/staff/142137).

Leonardo Santhos is a Brazilian actor, voice actor, dubbing director, and streamer.

__Non-Anime Roles:__

- Pierce Wheels (Ben 10: Alien Force)
- Peter "Pete" Devin / Master Carter (BONDiNG)
- Agent Bratcher (Outer Banks)
- Henrich Zemo / Baron Zemo (1st voice; The Avengers: Earth's Mightiest Heroes)
- Soren (The Dragon Prince)
- Myst (Grand Chase: Dimensional Chaser)
- Spartan Jared Miller (Halo 4)
- Tetsuya Fukazawa (Ju-On: Origins)
- Kyd Miller (1st voice - 10th season; The X-Files)
- Onix (Gears of War: Judgement)
